q: Create with the heart; build with the mind.
h:
“Create with the heart; build with the mind.” —
Criss Jami

q: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
h:
“Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: Thought is so cunning, so clever, that it distorts everything for its own convenience.
h:
“Thought is so cunning, so clever, that it distorts everything for its own convenience.” —
Jiddu Krishnamurti

q: Each day your life grows a day shorter. Make every move count.
h:
“Each day your life grows a day shorter. Make every move count.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

q: A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.
h:
“A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.” —
Criss Jami

q: You have the freedom to be yourself, your true self, here and now, and nothing can stand in your way.
h:
“You have the freedom to be yourself, your true self, here and now, and nothing can stand in your way.” —
Richard Bach
